name: Bolster
tooltip: <B>> <C>50%</> reduced speed and vitals restored from all sources</>

name: Bleed
enh_tooltip: <B>> Absorbs one bleed clear, downgrades to bleed</>

name: Burn
tooltip: <B>> Constant fire damage and stat reduction, up to 20/s</>
<B>> Burn ticks don't deplete while moving over 8m/s</>

name: Corrode
tooltip: <B>> <C>100%</> reduced vitals restored from all sources</>
enh_tooltip: <B>> <C>50%</> of attempted vitals restoration drains vitals</>

name: Desync
tooltip: <B>> Scrambles radar, detections and targeting systems</>
enh_tooltip: <B>> <C>10 /s</> shock damage + stun while Core active</>
<B>><C>25</> shock damage + <C>4 s</> stun on relocation</>

name: Disable
tooltip: <B>> Disables: set augments/devices/projectiles, all forms of detections, radar, terminals, defense and ammo regeneration</>
<B>> Pauses active device/scan/tag/stim cooldowns for duration</>

name: Hyper
tooltip: > Full AUX and Aerial charges refill

name: Overcharge
tooltip: > <C>10%</> increased ground speed and climb speed
> Disable enemy players, devices and projectiles within <C>3 m</> for <C>2 s</>

name: Overkill
tooltip: > Melee attacks and body impacts bypass defense
> <C>100%</> reduced speed penalties and aux drain from all sources
<B>> <C>0 - 100%</> increased direct damage recieved, scaling proportionally with duration active from <C>0 - 5 s</>

name: Shroud
tooltip: > Immunity to: radar, detections, thermals, locks

name: Snare
enh_tooltip: <B>> Removes all aerial charges, maneuvers and the ability to climb</>
